metadata.title: CVE-2022-31744 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker could have injected CSS into stylesheets accessible viainternal URIs, such as resource:, and in doing so bypass a page's ContentSecurity Policy. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 91.11,Thunderbird < 102, Thunderbird < 91.11, and Firefox < 101.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
